quotes.quote: Believe the unbelievable and receive the impossible.
There is nothing so strange and so unbelievable that it has not been said by one philosopher or another.
All that we don't know is astonishing. Even more astonishing is what passes for knowing.
If you believe, then unbelievable things can sometimes be possible.
Belief has nothing to do with facts, especially for the unbelievable facts.
It is unbelievable the amount of hate the human body can sustain before it begins to break.
Believe the unbelievable, dream the impossible, never take no for an answer.
It is astonishing how little one feels alone when one loves.
A man will do astonishing things for a woman he is ardent about.
It is astonishing what an effort it seems to be for many people to put their brains definitely and systematically to work.
It is astonishing with how little wisdom mankind can be governed, when that little wisdom is its own.
It is astonishing what force, purity, and wisdom it requires for a human being to keep clear of falsehoods.
It always seems impossible until it’s done.
It's unbelievable the primitive feelings that are aroused by rapid change.
Our minds have unbelievable power over our bodies.
It's truly unbelievable, the tenacity of life.
If we all helped one person, wouldn't the world be an unbelievable place?
In this unbelievable universe in which we live, there are no absolutes. Even parallel lines, reaching into infinity, meet somewhere yonder.
It is astonishing how the human animal survives its misfortunes.
It is wonderful how quickly you get used to things, even the most astonishing.
To believe a thing impossible is to make it so.
To the timid and hesitating everything is impossible because it seems so.
Because a thing seems difficult for you, do not think it impossible for anyone to accomplish.
The impossible often has a kind of integrity which the merely improbable lacks.
The only place where your dream becomes impossible is in your own thinking.
There is only one thing that makes a dream impossible to achieve: the fear of failure.
There is nothing impossible to him who will try.
